output.sentences: The android mascot, "Bottie" went on many adventures this year.
So as not to lose track of the time, android Bottie took along her trusty sundial.
Parks across the nation offered many sights to revel in, such as this fountain, statues, and more.
Bottie liked sitting back and watching people walk by the most.
Of course, no adventure would be complete without posting a collage of selfies for her android fans.
